title: Serial cannot be managed from the online store.
labels: cannot add license to my account
Serial cannot be managed from the online store
serial cannot be managed from the online store
Cannot add license to my account

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have an Educational license
  • I am trying to add my license to my account on the Unity Online Store 
  • I receive this error:

sections.title: Cause
content: Educational licenses have added security features. This means that they cannot be managed through the Online Store and need to be managed through us.

sections.title: Resolution
content: To make changes to your license, for example adding activations or upgrading you will need to contact sales here.
To return activations on your license, you can get in touch with Support here.
